name: Newbie's Advanced Hit Counter
short_description: [INACTIVE] A minimalistic PHP/MySQL Page Hit Counter. Designed for bandwidth monitoring. Easily see which pages are getting viewed the most so you can tune those pages for size and speed. Web-based interface for viewing or setting individual counters/gra
